context: The number of options outstanding and exercisable as at 31 March was as follows: The weighted average market value per ordinary share for PSP options exercised in 2019 was 445.0p (2018: n/a). The PSP awards outstanding at 31 March 2019 have a weighted average remaining vesting period of 0.8 years (2018: 1.2 years) and a weighted average contractual life of 7.6 years (2018: 8.2 years).
questions: What was the number of options granted in 2019?
What was the weighted average market value per ordinary share for PSP options exercised in 2019?
For which years were the number of options outstanding at 31 March calculated in?
How many items in the table had values provided in 2019 but not in 2018?
What was the change in the amount Outstanding at 1 April in 2019 from 2018?
What was the percentage change in the amount Outstanding at 1 April in 2019 from 2018?
